# endpointmonitor_proxy_hosts (Data Source)

Search for multiple Proxy Hosts. A list of ids will be returned for all matches found.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "endpointmonitor_proxy_hosts" "example" {
  search = ""
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `search` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `ids` (List of Number)
